title: Bake Cookbook Configuration
description: Schema for cookbook.yml files that define collections of recipes

variables.description: Variables defined at the cookbook level, available to all recipes in this cookbook. Values can be strings, numbers, booleans, arrays, or objects.

overrides.description: Environment-specific variable overrides for this cookbook (e.g., dev, prod, staging). Keys are environment names, values are variable name-value maps

environment.description: Environment variables to be inherited by all recipes in this cookbook

tags.description: Tags for filtering recipes (e.g., 'frontend', 'backend', 'api'). Recipes without tags inherit these cookbook tags.

recipes.description: Collection of recipes in this cookbook

recipe.description: A recipe definition that can be executed

description.description: Human-readable description of what this recipe does

tags.description: Tags for filtering this recipe (e.g., 'frontend', 'backend', 'api'). If not specified, inherits from cookbook tags.

run.description: The shell command(s) to execute for this recipe

template.description: Name of the template to use for this recipe (alternative to inline definition)

parameters.description: Parameters to pass to the template

variables.description: Recipe-specific variables. Values can be strings, numbers, booleans, arrays, or objects.

overrides.description: Environment-specific variable overrides for this recipe (e.g., dev, prod, staging). Keys are environment names, values are variable name-value maps

environment.description: Environment variables to inherit for this recipe

dependencies.description: List of recipes that must complete before this recipe can run

items.description: Recipe name (same cookbook) or cookbook:recipe (cross-cookbook dependency)

inputs.description: File patterns that affect this recipe's output (used for cache invalidation)

outputs.description: File patterns that this recipe produces (cached and restored)
